712900.name: Niche - a genetic survival game Soundtrack
712900.description:
This is the Soundtrack of Niche - a genetics survival game, in MP3 and Wav format.

If you enjoy Niche's music, please consider buying this OST to support our composer Andi Bissig who did an amazing job creating this soundtrack!

Tracklist:

1. Snowy Peaks (4:20)
2. Cactus Lover (4:10)
3. Frosty Jungle (3:44)
4. Peaceful Meadow (3:40)
5. Flowers and Puddles (4:32)
6. Three Apes (4:10)
7. First Winter (3:25)
8. Summer Days (3:54)
9. Dawn and Dusk (4:36)
10. Swamp Hunter (4:04)
11. Oasis (Bonus Track) (2:54)
712900.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
